lenders.name: Kristin
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing that my small loan is really going to have an impact on the person receiving the loan.

lenders.name: Steve and Shelley
lenders.occupation: Aero space engineer and real estate broker
lenders.loan_because: We enjoy the success of others.  If we can be a small part of helping that to happen for someone, then what a blessing.  Also, we want our grandchildren to know that part of being successful is helping others be successful.
lenders.occupational_info: Steve is an aero space engineer who works for Nasa.  Currently he is working on a mission to Jupiter.  Shelley is a real estate broker and real estate investor.  She travels around the country giving seminars on "How to Get Started in Investing" and offers a Women Investment Network program.

lenders.name: Gustavo
lenders.occupation: Owner of a  Information Technology Company

lenders.name: Nadja
lenders.loan_because: I love the Idea of helping inviduals who are trying to help themselves despite their economic or social challenges or disadvantages.

lenders.name: Ben (left) and Abbey

my master desires to:

be Creative
be Loving
be Kind
be Beautiful
be Expanding
be Abundant
be Receptive

lenders.name: Ramin
lenders.loan_because:
With how our world 'leaders' and institutions are
running things, I think it is time to take matters
more into our own hands to try to create the world we all know is possible!
lenders.occupational_info: I teach international students English as a second language in the US and abroad.  I try to teach how communication, expression and interaction are vital to being a more complete and real human being.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: These loans have a ripple effects in their communities. They raise expectations because people see their neighbors succeeding.

lenders.name: Greg
lenders.loan_because: It makes sense.

lenders.name: Rudy
lenders.loan_because: I work in pharmaceutical distribution and previously worked for a non-profit credit union. I believe the opportunities provided by KIVA and the field partners is real and miraculous. Also, it is gratifying to see my donation at work.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to help independent pharmacies compete with chain pharmacies through increased negotiation on their behalf with insurance companies and assistance with contracting issues.

lenders.name: Azizi Jennis
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: If I can help even one person it makes it all worthwhile.

lenders.name: jamillah
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to help out!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an actor.  Sometimes I'm on television.

lenders.name: Duane and Frieda
lenders.loan_because: this is our chance to help someone to help themselves and their loved ones.  We have been blessed and want to share our good fortune.

lenders.name: Lissa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people around the world better themselves with a hand up, not a hand out.  This will enable them to provide a better life for themselves, their families, and for their community.
lenders.occupational_info: Through our research efforts on the eye, we are learning about sight-threatening eye disease and how to improve the clinical treatment to prevent blindness

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: a relatively small amount of money for someone luckily born in a rich part of the world can make such a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I help a company expand its business.

lenders.name: Mitch & Susan
lenders.loan_because: There is such satisfaction from working hard because you are responsible for your own life and what you make of it.  We understand others need just a little in order to accomplish the same in their own lives. When others work hard and are responsible, our satisfaction comes from that.
lenders.occupational_info: Making wise investments helps us to have extra in our lives and we want the people we lend money to share with others in need.

lenders.name: cris
lenders.loan_because: it's time for me to share
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a major telecom company

lenders.name: RIck
lenders.loan_because: To help make the difference
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people realize their ambitions

lenders.name: Eric Wilson

lenders.occupational_info: I am a serial entrepreneur in the computer software industry.

lenders.name: Vyktur
lenders.loan_because: I've always wanted to, and then I found Kiva. It's the right thing to do if you believe in the economic theory.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a full-time computer programmer and a part-time Christian campus minister (full-time Christian, part-time minister ^.^)

lenders.name: Marco

lenders.occupational_info: Busy.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Thomas
lenders.occupational_info: Consulting and project management. Helping others achieving goals

lenders.name: Alejandro
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better cause than helping others  build a better life for themselves and their families.

lenders.name: nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people grow their business

lenders.name: Sergio
lenders.loan_because: I like to help make positive change inn the world. Helping others become independent and successful is something I find deeply rewarding.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to keep busy helping others find work and hire others to work for me and compensate them for work well done. I find the work and keep work coming in and organize a team of workers to complete the job assignments.

lenders.name: nadia

lenders.occupational_info: I am Ph D candidate in the department of political science at Rutgers University. I study representation and secondary marginalized groups - specifically in the Black and feminist communities.

lenders.name: In Memory of Keith Yap

lenders.name: Marco Vidal
lenders.loan_because: It seems a nice online project.

lenders.loan_because: I want to empower entrepreneurs in the developing world to lift themselves out of poverty.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help serious individuals to be able to help themselves and, in doing so, to help others in society.
lenders.occupational_info: I am  retired Public Servant from Trinidad and Tobago. I carry on a  small, home-based retail business in consumer goods.

lenders.name: Molly

One world, one people.

lenders.occupational_info: managing 4 kids, of all ages!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: it's what I do.

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.loan_because: Simply put - I love people... We should help each other as much possible, and as long as I am able I will.  Our obligation to our fellow man extends worldwide, not just to the borders of our country of birth.

lenders.loan_because: I've seen first hand how microloans can change lives..
lenders.occupational_info: I am a grant writer for an early education non-profit

lenders.name: D&S Fancy
lenders.loan_because: We have been very fortunate in life and we want to help improve the lives of others.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a kitchen designer  and I am a laboratory technician.

lenders.name: Delio
lenders.loan_because: I not have large resources but I prefer not going out  one night to fun and try to help those who most need

lenders.name: Karen
lenders.loan_because: I know how educational and rewarding starting and operating one's own company can be.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide interior design services to companies, healthcare facilities and homeowners.  My current LEED accreditation enables me to integrate sustainable design processes and products into my projects for healthier and more productive interior environments.

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because:
My father is from Afghanistan and I am proud of that.It is our duty to not horde wealth but rather share it with our brothers whether they be Afghan,African,or American.Nations should not divide us,we are all human beings of this planet.
Now,ill get off my mini-soapbox.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student and a member of the US Army

lenders.name: Andrew Hollister
lenders.loan_because: I loan because  can

lenders.name: Cátia
lenders.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference with what I have, no matter how small it is.

lenders.loan_because: We want to help those who long to escape a life of poverty and improve conditions in their community.
lenders.occupational_info: In addition to voicing the ideas and concerns of the Middle School students, our student council raises funds by selling healthy snacks during our break period.  We are happy to be able to donate these funds to a number of charitable organizations.

lenders.name: Jesse
lenders.loan_because: Kiva allows one person to perform the actions of the IMF/World Bank for one or many others in a more humane, realistic and reasonable way. Knowing that I can help fund someone's business that could allow them to send their first family member to school, provide a constant income, and contribute to the economic growth and stability of an entire community.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and build internet web sites for business's.

lenders.name: Bob and Laurie
lenders.loan_because: It's a nice feeling to donate a small amount of money and see it make a huge difference in other's lives.

lenders.name: Emily and Derek
lenders.occupation: Real Estate Sales Agent and Music Minister
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us in many ways and we would like to pay it forward to as many as we can.

lenders.name: Danee
lenders.loan_because: we love to help other people and we have always appreciated how much others have helped us!  Its our turn to give back!
lenders.occupational_info: We are the Transitions Program at our High School.  Our main idea of our program is respect, giving, and hard work.  We work not only in our school but also out in the community.

lenders.name: Core 11 Seton Hall
lenders.loan_because: We saved for a week on unnecessary luxuries (lattes, snacks, nails, parties) and made a loan.
lenders.occupational_info:
Freshmen College Students of Dr. Beneteau's Core 1101 (The Big Questions) class at Seton Hall University -- class of 2011.  Mostly Political Science majors.

PROFESSOR'S NOTE:  I'm proud of you guys!

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people make a difference in their lives.

lenders.name: Craig M.
lenders.loan_because: it feels good to participate in helping.

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: I consider myself extremely fortunate and truly blessed.  Although I am not a wealthy individual, I do look for ways to help whenever and however possible.  Hopefully my participation in Kiva will help empower people around the globe to be all that they can be.  Further, the Kiva organization is nothing short of terrific as it helps identify those most in need.  In addition, when reading some of the other lender's profiles, I feel honored to be among them!  Anyone wishing to correspond, feel free to email me at "cturner25@triad.rr.com."
lenders.occupational_info: As the Director for Research Administration in the Department of Pharmacology at UNC-CH, I work as a member of a highly trained team to effectively manage federal, state and private sponsored research programs.  The department's primary mission is 1) to educate and train scientists and physicians in the discipline of pharmacology for the challenges of today and tomorrow, 2) to make discoveries in research that are relevant to medicine and the basic mechanisms underlying the causes of human disease, 3) to work with other scientists and physicians in an interdisciplinary approach to translate basic discovery into new treatments and cures of human disease.

lenders.name: Kelli
lenders.loan_because: I liked the idea of giving support to people who are working hard and trying to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I keep track of where the money goes in a business.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed with so much.  In America, I hear of many millions of people less fortunate and in great need, and I want to help, but do not know how.  There are many organizations that profess to help the poor, but much of the money is used up in administrative or other costs and does not reach the people in need.  Kiva seems like a way to help those in need more directly with more of the money, and in a way that is self sustaining.

lenders.occupational_info: Our farm grows corn, wheat, soybeans and sunflowers.  We all have various careers.

lenders.name: Julianne
lenders.occupational_info: I am learning how to create solutions to problems through making objects, systems or services.

lenders.name: Chase
lenders.loan_because: I generally consider myself a charitable person, but I don't like giving things to people who haven't earned them. Kiva allows me to remain true to my personal principles while empowering individuals in developing countries to create change in themselves
lenders.occupational_info: I study at Claremont McKenna College, a small liberal arts school in Southern California.

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: Micro loans empower people, particularly women and entire communities by extension. These loans support entrepreneurship, alleviate poverty and restore dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a cook by trade and at present  run my own chai business out of my home in Vermont

lenders.name: Helder
lenders.loan_because: I think that instead of subsiding,  we have to fight poverty with initiative. Together we are more, we are stronger.
lenders.occupational_info: Well... a guy who likes share knowledge. Higher education in IT applications on Chemical Engineering Problems. As a teacher, since I like sharing knowledge... you know, sharing is about giving along while you receive. Right?

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel so good I almost feel guilty - I can't think of anything with such a return for so little effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I write short stories, novels and movies.

lenders.name: Hunter & Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: we can't move a mountain but we cn help push.
lenders.occupational_info: Map making & Conservation

lenders.name: Heather
lenders.occupational_info: I help people get stronger after they hurt themselves

lenders.name: Milton
lenders.loan_because: My contribution to small businesses may have a significant impact on the lives of many

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: helping those in need brings warmth to myself and a future for those who need it more than I do.
lenders.occupational_info: there is nothing better than giving back, and helping others find their dream home is extremely fulfilling.

lenders.name: KdgnCivicHouseASP
lenders.loan_because: Service Learning Project
lenders.occupational_info: Teacher

lenders.name: David and Valerie
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others and it is the right thing to do!
lenders.occupational_info:
As a social worker, I help abused and neglected children to learn to be positive, overcome challenges and to free themselves from the pain they have experienced.
Valerie as a teacher promotes among children positive attitude and a good self-esteem.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: We believe people will pay back the loans and grow their businesses even more because of it.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the U.S. Defense Department building radars

lenders.name: sharad pawar
lenders.loan_because: I believe that business is one of the strongest ways to enable social change.

lenders.name: Chad
lenders.loan_because: I am on the board of Micro Business Development, a large microlender in Denver, and through this experience I have come to realize the power of microfinance and believe wholeheartedly that it is one of the best tools we have to change the world for the better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in the buying and selling of assets for a large media and communications company.

lenders.name: Lynne
lenders.loan_because:
I lost my son in 2005, he was only 23 yo and this is something that I do in memory of him. He was always concerned for those less fortunate, loved the underdog so i think he would approve!
Update Dec 2011 Mum passed away a week before Christmas and so I added some loans in her honour -  clothing and jewellery, her favourite things!

lenders.name: Elisabeth
lenders.loan_because: it's a way to make my donations go much further - a good way for anyone who wants to help but can't spare much.  And it helps people become self-sufficient - the more people we can raise out of critical need, the more there is to go around when a need arises.

lenders.name: Waddah
lenders.loan_because: As a human, I feel that I am obligated to help my follow human being; who needs my help in time of need.
lenders.occupational_info: I would like not  to comment on this question. Thanks

lenders.name: Gita and Sonny
lenders.loan_because: We believe in sustainable development by empowering people to move out of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: Empowerment.

lenders.name: Joni
lenders.loan_because: One person can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: General merchandise wholesale business

lenders.name: Megan
lenders.loan_because: personal success is empowering
lenders.occupational_info: I study economics and international finance

lenders.name: craig
lenders.loan_because: taken a gamble and invested their time and money in me and my personal dreams. I am willing to do the same through Kiva because I understand just important it is to know that others believe in you and your personal goals.   I also think that in a global community it's important to help your neighbors- even if they reside behind another border. Thank you Kiva for giving me the opportunity to help!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a working artist and student of the humanities

lenders.name: Sally-Ann
lenders.loan_because: it seems like such a small thing to do, yet it helps someone lift themselves out of poverty
lenders.occupational_info: Creative Director for a marketing and retail promotions company

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference in someones life.

lenders.name: craig
lenders.loan_because: I think there is a need to let the world know all Americans aren't self centered.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a carpenter.

lenders.name: Bev
lenders.loan_because: I hope my little bit of money will make a  big difference in the life of someone who is probably working very hard.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am retired from my job as a newspaper reporter but continue working as a volunteer. 
My husband and I raised our  four children on a dairy farm. I am now a widow with five grandchildren and live alone with my dog, Kita.

lenders.name: Vlad
lenders.loan_because: I'm a business owner in Massachusetts.  I know how it is to have an idea and not have the funds for it just when you need it the most.  It's funny how the banks won't give money to those that need it the most, but it is available to those who have plenty.  So why not help those people that banks refuse.    =)
lenders.occupational_info: A home improvement business concentrating on advanced gutter protection systems.

lenders.name: Pam
lenders.loan_because: there but for the grace of god, go I
lenders.occupational_info: I pay my bills as a graphic designer; I pay my soul by creating jewelry.

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a Junior High School as the technology specialist taking care of computers and classroom technology.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: All of our brothers and sisters around the world should have the privlage of living a decent life.
lenders.occupational_info: environment, health, and safety

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: My life has been extraordinarily blessed and through Kiva, I hope to share what wealth I can with those making an effort to improve their own lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage work across multiple businesses.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I work in Latin America and see what a difference a little money can make. Just the cost of a couple weeks worth of lattes can make huge difference to people elsewhere.

lenders.name: Jeraldeen
lenders.loan_because: To make the world a better place - one step at a time.

lenders.name: Murf
lenders.loan_because: It is easy and I do so little and I think it means a lot to the borrower.
lenders.occupational_info: techy

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: My mother and I were very poor
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people make money

lenders.name: Kyle
lenders.loan_because: it is the best possible solution to poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full time student, I study at a university.

lenders.name: Tasha
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone deserves a chance to achieve a goal they set in their life.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people learn about money management so they can achieve (or maintain) financial independence.

lenders.name: Charles & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I believe that everyone deserves a chance to succeed. Sometimes it just takes the faith of a stranger turned friend!
lenders.occupational_info: I mix medicines that help sick people feel better.

lenders.name: C.K. Sidhu
lenders.loan_because: It all adds up.

lenders.name: MoneyLender
lenders.loan_because: I can get my money back... its not charity.
lenders.occupational_info: I make money.

lenders.name: Roy W.
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others realize their dreams of expanding or starting a small business. Kiva provides a realistic opportunity to make this happen and a certain level of confidence for the participants.
lenders.occupational_info: I love working on challenges that are computer related. I am unsure what I would do if they were not around...maybe a mechanic like my father. I have always liked to troubleshoot things.

lenders.name: Frank and Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do...

lenders.name: Yvonne
lenders.loan_because: The lines on the map aren't real.  We are all one on our journey on this planet.  My goal is to make a loan in every country.

lenders.name: drgeff
lenders.loan_because: give give give in anyway possible
lenders.occupational_info: Clinical Psychologist providing free therapy for gambling addiction in los angeles

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: Kiva.org makes me an offer that I can't refuse.
lenders.occupational_info: I spent my whole life trying not to be careless.

lenders.name: Pedro
lenders.occupational_info: I sell automotive tools.

lenders.name: Peter Basso & Family
lenders.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to extend my hand in friendship to those whom have enough initiative to be self employed in a tough world.
lenders.occupational_info: Besides having a law degree, I we tend to 400 organic appletrees in Northern California. I also have a daughter who is 18, and a son who is 14.  That's his handsome face in the display picture, he's attempting to eat our dog....:)

lenders.name: Manuel
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English as a foreign language to corporate students in Portugal

lenders.name: Dina
lenders.loan_because: I was given a loan years ago to accomplish my dream. These hard working,good people deserve the same opportunity. How wonderful that I can help!
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of people who have had surgery.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of human beings; their desire to improve their lives and their desire to provide better opportunities for their children. I believe is the responsibility of each individual to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: Evaluation and treatment of the criminally insane.

lenders.name: Roderik
lenders.loan_because: I can and do it!

lenders.name: Remco
lenders.loan_because: I think this is a beautiful way of helping fellow entrepreneurs help themselves, in a very personal way.
lenders.occupational_info: I have my own business, I am a designer and webdeveloper. I design and program websites and help other businesses with their identity and communication. I am also a co-founder of a charity:  www.steppingstonesforafrica.org

lenders.name: Diogo
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for the national railways. My job deals with all environmental issues that may arise due to the construction, operation and maintenance of railways in Portugal.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: it is a way to reach out and help someone who is trying to improve their life.

lenders.name: Tiago
lenders.loan_because: i live in a part of the world where people have a overall good quality of live. This is just a tinny little thing i can do to balance world money distribution.
lenders.occupational_info: i create software, not the best job i could ever imagine, but i need someway of earning money, and its not that bad afterall...

lenders.name: Ricardo
lenders.loan_because: We can make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Teatcher/researcher.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to...

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because:
Acredito que posso fazer a diferença...
I believe I can make a difference...

lenders.name: Alisa & Lane
lenders.loan_because: Because we are also small business owners.

lenders.name: Marya
lenders.loan_because: it's important to me to help others realize their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an English teacher.

lenders.name: Micky
lenders.loan_because: The Kiva model simply works.  My wife and I travel the world on a frequent basis and the need for micro-loans is more crucial than ever!

lenders.name: Elin
lenders.loan_because: It can make a big impact on someones life.

lenders.name: Janna
lenders.loan_because: For the past  5 years I have owned and operated a small, home-based business.  I understand how a small amount of money can make a big difference to people running their own businesses.  I have been blessed with success and want to help others do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: I create art on my computer and then print it onto clothing (shirts, hats, etc.).  I then sell the items I create online and in my small retail store.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: I want others to succeed in controlling their own destiny.

lenders.name: Betty
lenders.occupation: Notetaker for a student who is a quadraplegic

lenders.name: Jarleif
lenders.loan_because: I want other people to have the possibilities.....

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, even if only in a small way. I'm a single parent and am especially interested in helping other moms.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in online education.

lenders.name: luisgalveias
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a chance to people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Back in my country I also support entrepreneurs raising capital to their projects.

lenders.name: Felix
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur active in the internet & technology sector.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I understand the value of a dollar
lenders.occupational_info: I am studying agriculture

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: Money is love!

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I think everyone deserves a chance to succeed in life.

lenders.name: Filipe Silva Guerra
lenders.loan_because: Helping people to improve their life´s and set an example to my children.

lenders.name: Laura Lana
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I like to see other people's ideas;  I browse the site even when I am not lending.  Of course it always feels good  when I am able to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work almost every day at a restaurant but I prefer to think of myself as a homemaker!

lenders.name: Rodrigo
lenders.loan_because: I think we all have the need to help and Kiva is a real path. Giving out money will never solve the world's poverty, supporting entrepreneurs may have a chance...

lenders.name: Jim
lenders.loan_because: Maybe I can make a difference and help someone improve his/her life.

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: Everyone whom I know already has enough (too-much) "stuff". In the part of the world in which I live we're driven to acquire more and more. I have been blessed to travel internationally and I have come to appreciate those cultures where family and community are "what matters". This is a way in which I can contribute to people of those cultures. Hopefully I can continue to pass it on, a few entrepeneurs at a time. My intention is to add a few more gifts each year and to never stop passing it on.
lenders.occupational_info: My mission in life is: "to create loving, caring, and supportive communities by honoring the diversity and similarities amongst all peoples."

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all deserve a chance to thrive.

lenders.name: Joanna & Kim
lenders.loan_because: We want to help end world poverty.

lenders.name: Yelena
lenders.occupation: Technical Recruiter for a consulting company
lenders.loan_because: because budget is a huge challenge to meet but should not be the stopping block on the way of the talent and guts of these entrepreneurs
lenders.occupational_info: I discover and hire technical and business consultants for my company. I am also working on my masters degree in Industrial/Organizational Psychology

lenders.name: Rui Filipe
lenders.loan_because: I want to help!

lenders.name: Heman
lenders.loan_because: I believe in micro-financing.
lenders.occupational_info: I am interested about how the future is represented in various ways through the imagination of individuals. This is where my work is located.

lenders.name: Monique
lenders.loan_because:
I want to empower women to porvide the best life for themselves. their friends and their families.
I am particularly interested in helping those women who by receiving these loans will be able to provide education for their children.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a medical device company in North America which sells blood collection tubes to hospitals and physicians offices for diagnostic purposes.  The tubes are specifically designed for use in newborns, children and cancer patients.

lenders.name: Hermann
lenders.loan_because: I believe if we are in a position to help others, we have an obligation to do so. Thanks to Kiva, making a difference is that easy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm the founder of TUXAMOON, a political, cultural and social platform.

lenders.name: Cynthia
lenders.loan_because: My long term goal is to be an entrepreneur. I believe helping others establish their businesses is a great investment. It warms my heart to know that the little money I donate helps someone's dream become a reality.
lenders.occupational_info: I sale designer clothing in a store.

lenders.name: VALICIA
lenders.loan_because: I love to make a difference!  This is a way I can help make the world a more beautiful place in every way.
lenders.occupational_info: So much fun!  I just love what I do.

lenders.name: Helen and Simon
lenders.loan_because: We want to help provide opportunities to individuals who dream big and work hard.

lenders.name: Bárbara
lenders.loan_because: To contribute to build a better world.

lenders.name: Sara
lenders.loan_because: I care!

lenders.name: Polonca
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I own a small business. We want to help other people set up businesses and improve their lives.

lenders.name: Francis Almeida
lenders.loan_because: It allows those who will not get funded through commerical banks a chance to access funds that allows them a chance to make a life for themselves and their families. We need to help our fellow human beings have a chance at a better life.

lenders.name: Pedia
lenders.loan_because: Our staff is made up of caring people who want to make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: Our company works to improve the health of all people, by working with other companies to make better medicines for everyone.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I read an interview with Moses, an MFI representative in Uganda. He explained how the poorest of the poor do not think of tomorrow because they are so focused on the next morsel they can get for their families. For these people there is no tomorrow, only the challenge of surviving today. These small Kiva loans have so dramatically changed the lives of some people, Moses said "they now think of tomorrow." Can you give someone anything better than tomorrow?

lenders.name: Chris Bitler
lenders.loan_because: "It makes a difference to someone else!"
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an internal auditor for the consumer goods company Church & Dwight (Arm & Hammer, Trojan, OxiClean, etc.).  I dabble around on the internet in my spare time - buying domains and tinkering with web sites and blogs.

lenders.name: Tom
lenders.loan_because: I believe that your quality of life shouldn't be determined by the birth country lottery. Hard-working people given the opportunity can succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I design parts of the phone system.

lenders.name: Ruschele
lenders.loan_because: It just feels good to help those that are trying to help themselves. We all need to help each other out!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a paper pusher!!!!

lenders.name: Vasco
lenders.loan_because: I believe in a better world with more opportunities for people that want to do and change their lifes!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a portfolio manager for Pension Funds and Funds of Funds.

lenders.name: Dean / Gail
lenders.loan_because: We care for people.
lenders.occupational_info: We enable people to love God and others.
